src_original: yaś cātmānaṃ jayet ekaṃ saṃgrāmo durjayaḥ sa vai // māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeya śataṃ samā / ekaṃ ca bhāvitāttānaṃ muhuttam api pūjaye / sā eva paujanā śreyo yac cha vaśśaśataṃ hutaṃ //
tgt_original: 自勝最賢，　　故曰人雄，護意調身，　　自損至終。 　　雖曰尊天，神魔梵釋，　　皆莫能勝，　　自勝之人。

src_original: (māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeya śataṃ samā /)
tgt_original: 月千反祠，　　終身不輟，　　不如須臾，

src_original: yac vaikaṃ bhāvitātmānaṃ muhūrtam api pūjayet / sā tasya pūjanā śreṣṭatā na tad varṣaśataṃ hutam // yo ca vaśśaśataṃ jantū aggiṃ paricare vane / ekañ ca bhāvitāttānaṃ muhuttam api pūjaye / sā eva pūjanā śreyo yac cha vaśśaśataṃ hutaṃ //
tgt_original: 一心念法，　　一念道福，　　勝彼終身；

src_original: yac ca varṣaśataṃ pūrṇam agniṃ paricared vane /
tgt_original: 雖終百歲，　　奉事火祠，　　不如須臾，
比丘行如是，　　可以免眾苦。
手足莫妄犯，　　節言順所行，

src_original: ajjhattarato samāhito eko saṃtuṣito tam āhu bhikkhuṃ /
tgt_original: 常內樂定意，　　守一行寂然。
學當守口，　　宥言安徐，　　法義為定，

src_original: saṃ lābhaṃ nātimaṃñeyā nā 'ṃñesaṃ prihayaṃ care // aṃñesaṃ prihayaṃ bhikkhū samādhin nādhigacchati /
tgt_original: 學無求利，無愛他行，　　比丘好他，　　不得定意。

src_original: Sahasra sahasram api ce vācā anatthapadasāhitā /
tgt_original: 雖誦千言，　　不義何益？

src_original: ekaṃ atthapadaṃ śreyo yaṃ śottā upaśāṃmati //
tgt_original: 不如一義，　　聞行可度；

src_original: yo ca gāthāśataṃ anatthapadasāhitaṃ / ekaṃ dhamapadaṃ śreyo yaṃ śottā upaśāmmati // yac ca gāthāśataṃ anarthapadasaṃhitam / ekaṃ dharmapadaṃ śreyo yac chrutvā hy upaśāmyati //
tgt_original: 雖多誦經，不解何益？ 　　解一法句，　　行可得道。

src_original: yo sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ saṃggrāme mānuṣe jine / ekaṃ ca paṃñam āttānaṃ sa ve saṃggrāmamuttamo //
tgt_original: 千千為敵，　　一夫勝之，　　未若自勝，

src_original: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ saṃgrāme dviṣatāṃ jayet /
